commit.message:
Merge pull request #44 from Manishearth/cmp_nan

new lint to check for doomed comparisons to NAN

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,21 @@
+#![feature(plugin)]
+#![plugin(clippy)]
+
+#[deny(cmp_nan)]
+fn main() {
+	let x = 5f32;
+	x == std::f32::NAN; //~ERROR
+	x != std::f32::NAN; //~ERROR
+	x < std::f32::NAN; //~ERROR	
+	x > std::f32::NAN; //~ERROR
+	x <= std::f32::NAN; //~ERROR
+	x >= std::f32::NAN; //~ERROR
+
+	let y = 0f64;
+	y == std::f64::NAN; //~ERROR
+	y != std::f64::NAN; //~ERROR
+	y < std::f64::NAN; //~ERROR
+	y > std::f64::NAN; //~ERROR
+	y <= std::f64::NAN; //~ERROR
+	y >= std::f64::NAN; //~ERROR
+}
